translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン首都、ラング・バウ――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hermann's capital, Lang Bau――

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ達がバボラ討伐の報を聞き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila and the others heard the report of Babora's defeat,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会議を開いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and were holding a meeting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やってくれたぜ、あいつ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He did it, that guy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、本当に魔人を倒すなんて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought he'd actually defeat the demon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、驚きました……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, I was surprised..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヒューバートさん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mr. Hubert.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の様子はどうなっていますか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How are the demon forces doing?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「奴らは魔人の強さに絶大な信頼を置いてる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They placed great trust in the demon's strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから逆に、魔人が倒れたと知るや戦意喪失、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So conversely, when they learned the demon was defeated, they lost their will to fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 近くの部隊は散り散りに逃げていったぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the nearby units scattered and fled."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっ……そうですか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew... I see..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマン軍で追撃をかけて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Hermann army launched a pursuit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大分奪われた土地を取り戻せました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and we managed to reclaim much of the lost territory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへっ、おかげで軍の編成や
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh, thanks to that, the army's organization and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 配置は再考の必要ありで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: deployment need to be reconsidered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忙しい中ここまで呼び戻されちまった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so amidst the busyness, we've been called back this far."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「嬉しい悲鳴って奴だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's what you call a happy cry."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、その通りですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, exactly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの、ところで……ランス様は……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, by the way... where is Lord Rance...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、まだ戻ってきてないようだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, it seems he hasn't returned yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラは倒したんだ、きっとすぐに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He defeated Babora, so surely he'll be back soon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来たわよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、噂をすればなんとやらだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, speak of the devil."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「派手にパレード……って訳にはいかんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We can't exactly hold a grand parade,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せいぜい英雄様の凱旋を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but let's at least warmly welcome our hero's return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 温かく迎えてやろうじゃないか」
「今、帰ったぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's just returned..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは真っ赤な血まみれだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance was drenched in bright red blood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ、くさっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, gross!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだ、その格好。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what's with that appearance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前、どこで何してたんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where have you been and what have you been doing?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ？　馬鹿言うな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Don't be ridiculous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラを殺してきたんじゃないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just killed Babora, didn't I?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気絶させることは成功したが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I managed to knock him out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけじゃ死なんからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but that alone won't kill him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっから先が大変だったんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What came after that was tough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「刺しても剣が届かんから胸のとこを開いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even stabbing wouldn't reach, so I opened up his chest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うし車よりも巨大な心臓を何度も何度も……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and repeatedly... cut at his heart, bigger than an ox cart..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、やめてやめて、ランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, stop, stop, Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出すと吐き気が……うっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just thinking about it makes me feel sick... ugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しばらくお肉食べられそうにないです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I probably won't be able to eat meat for a while..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ〜、色々と大変だったようだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, sounds like you've been through quite a lot..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ところで馴れ馴れしい奴だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, you're pretty familiar. Who are you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰だお前？」
「ヒューバートだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm Hubert!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと前まで一緒に戦ってたろう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We were fighting together just a little while ago!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So conversely, when they learned the demon was defeated, they lost their will to fight,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほっ……そうですか……」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへっ、おかげで軍の編成や
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh heh, thanks to that, the army's organization and

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: deployment need to be reconsidered,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 忙しい中ここまで呼び戻されちまった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so amidst the busyness, we've been called back this far."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, it seems he hasn't returned yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「来たわよー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、噂をすればなんとやらだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, speak of the devil."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「派手にパレード……って訳にはいかんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We can't exactly hold a grand parade,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せいぜい英雄様の凱旋を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but let's at least warmly welcome our hero's return.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 温かく迎えてやろうじゃないか」
「今、帰ったぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He's just returned..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは真っ赤な血まみれだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance was drenched in bright red blood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ、くさっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, gross!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだ、その格好。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-what's with that appearance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前、どこで何してたんだ？」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ？　馬鹿言うな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Don't be ridiculous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラを殺してきたんじゃないか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just killed Babora, didn't I?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気絶させることは成功したが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I managed to knock him out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけじゃ死なんからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but that alone won't kill him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そっから先が大変だったんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What came after that was tough."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「刺しても剣が届かんから胸のとこを開いて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even stabbing wouldn't reach, so I opened up his chest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うし車よりも巨大な心臓を何度も何度も……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and repeatedly... cut at his heart, bigger than an ox cart..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、やめてやめて、ランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, stop, stop, Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思い出すと吐き気が……うっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just thinking about it makes me feel sick... ugh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しばらくお肉食べられそうにないです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I probably won't be able to eat meat for a while..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ〜、色々と大変だったようだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, sounds like you've been through quite a lot..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ところで馴れ馴れしい奴だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By the way, you're pretty familiar. Who are you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰だお前？」
「ヒューバートだよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm Hubert!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと前まで一緒に戦ってたろう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We were fighting together just a little while ago!"
